item.title: About
item.description:
I am an Engineering Manager with a strong software engineering background in distributed systems, delivery execution, and pragmatic architecture.

Today I lead engineering in the Claims area at Prima, where I built and scaled teams around Data Management and Machine Learning initiatives. My work sits at the intersection of technical leadership, product delivery, and execution quality.

What I focus on

  • Building engineering teams that deliver predictably
  • Turning architecture decisions into measurable delivery outcomes
  • Designing systems that are maintainable, scalable, and operationally stable
  • Coaching engineers and growing new technical leaders

Operating style

I care about outcomes over hype.

item.title: Portfolio
item.description:
Selected Experience

Prima Assicurazioni — Engineering Manager (2023–Present)

Context: claims domain, data-intensive environment, high operational criticality.

  • Built and led the Claims Data Management team in a greenfield setup
  • Introduced and scaled a Data Mesh-oriented approach for domain data products
  • Partnered with Data Governance on company-wide data strategy
  • Built and evolved the Claims Antifraud initiative into a broader Claims Machine Learning scope
  • Mentored and developed internal leadership, including growth paths toward Engineering Manager responsibilities

Focus areas: team design, delivery execution, architecture decisions, Agile/Scrum operating model.

item.title: Services
item.description:
I help B2B SaaS engineering teams improve delivery predictability without architecture hype.

What I focus on

  • Reducing production instability and recurring critical bugs
  • Improving sprint predictability and execution discipline
  • Strengthening technical leadership and engineering ownership
  • Making release processes explicit, repeatable, and measurable

Engagement model

Fractional Technical Lead + Senior Implementation Partner

  • Initial technical audit
  • 90-day engineering roadmap
  • Delivery process setup (review/release discipline, CI/CD practices)
  • Hands-on implementation on core components (Python/Elixir)
  • Mentoring for internal engineers and new technical leaders

Typical outcomes in 90 days

  • Fewer critical defects reaching production
  • More stable sprint throughput and fewer delivery surprises
  • Clearer ownership and stronger technical decision-making

Who this is for

Startup and scale-up teams that need better delivery reliability, stronger engineering structure, and pragmatic architecture decisions.

item.title: Binary Search with Go, Python and C
item.description:
The Binary Search Algorithm

This page has been migrated to Medium

The Binary Search Algorithm is a search algorithm that works for sorted collections (e.g. sorted arrays). It takes as input a collection, the length of that collection and an element to find, and gives as output the index of the element in the collection (if it exists).

This algorithm is as efficient as easy to learn due to its simplicity.
